message: Starting review - gathering phase handover and agent findings
Reviewing test agent output to verify completion criteria
Evaluation complete - agent met all success criteria, preparing verdict

Review completed but BLOCKED by critical bug: submit_review_verdict fails with 'no such column: final_verdict'. SQLite schema incomplete. Phase deliverables were met (agent completed successfully), but cannot submit verdict due to system bug. The SQLite migration needs the final_verdict column added to agents table.
